Header.paragraph: ðŸ‘‹ I am a creative frontend developer

vianova.context: The data platform Cityscope from Vianova is intended for cities and governments who want to understand micro-mobility (connected devices such as shared scooters, mopeds, and so on) in public space. Vianova provides a neutral enabler of mobility management for connected vehicles. The platform communicates between operators’ api and Vianova’s api, same with cities’ api. My responsibilities were to implement the dashboard of the Cityscope platform.

features.title: This tool includes the following features:
feature: Fix bugs and improve the code for better performance

bam.context: BAM Archi is an online service dedicated to finding architects and contractors for renovation projects. Their goal: to democratize architecture among the general public in France and above all to reduce friction between individuals and architects by facilitating their exchanges. My responsibilities were to implement all admin interfaces for an intern tool.

features.title: This tool includes the following features:
feature: Get the visibility on the whole activity
Give permission according to the hierarchy of employees
Implement a CRM system in it

thelastone.context: The Last One is a 2D battle royal game project created with Unity. This project has been released as an end of studies project. I was part of eight members teams where I was in charge of project management, game design, and game development.

card.title: top down view
card.description: The Last One distinguishes itself from the common battle royal games by being in top-down view.

card.title: multiple powers
card.description: The player chooses three powers among a list before starting the game: invisibility, clone, dash, and more.

card.title: practical environment
card.description: The environment is also very useful: you can hide in the bushes, take underground tunnels or surprise the enemy in a building.
